alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:42AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. .Significant rainfall will contribute to further rises on the Sheyenne River. Additional rainfall today will also contribute to further rises. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 79.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 89.0 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
